author: potuz
content: What I found curious is that the address does not have a transaction included in that block, it has this transaction <https://etherscan.io/tx/0x4622b329ef3a86f407eadf56d336d59262afc97262b2e79a965666054ab2c03d> with nonce 34845 exactly in position 0 as in the error, but int he previous block.

author: potuz
content: So from here it looks as though you're trying to process the block twice
